      • checkForIncompleteTransaction

        public static void checkForIncompleteTransaction(android.content.Context context,
                                                 int requestCode)
        Method to if a previous card transaction is pending. A card transaction could be pending if no response was received after the transaction was initiated or if there was an app crash xafter the transaction was initiated. The Ezetap SDK checks for pending transactions at the very next Ezetap API call, it is recommeded that calling applications call this API at the appropriate time for eg. - upon login or upon calling pay cash where the handling is not done by the Ezetap system.
        Parameters:
        Context - context - Context of the calling Activity, the result will be supplied to the onActivityResult method of the calling Activity.
        int - requestCode - Request code you wish to handle for the result in onActivityResult method.

      • voidTransaction

        public static void voidTransaction(android.content.Context context,
                                   int requestCode,

        String - transactionID - The ID of the transaction which is to be voided
